name: SURVIVOR (itch) (Yetman)
description:
It is easy to survive but it is hard to be the only Survivor. Make sure no one else survives in this body swapping platformer game.

This is just a simple platformer except that whenever you kill something, you die and you take over its body and can only perform its actions. Pick the correct order of killing to ensure that only one remains at the end of the game.

This game is a submission to GMTK 2019 with the Theme "Only One".

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows for movement.
  • Z/Space/Up/W to Jump.
  • LeftShift/X/Left Mouse to Attack.
  • R to Restart Level.
  • Escape to exit to menu.
  • In Menu: AD/Arrows to select level, space/enter to play.

Credits:

  • Background sound from Sounds Crate.

Team Members:

  • Yahia Zakaria: Programming, Art, Design.
  • Yassin Zakaria: Design, Playtesting.

Note: The Windows version was added after the submission time. The only additional feature in the windows version is taking screenshots with P.
